 URL : "https://github.com/xuopled/react-google-maps-loader/issues/7" TITLE : can't use a decorator BODY : with the latest version of babel, along with preset-stage-0 , using a decorator results in a console error: uncaught typeerror: cannot call a class as a function at r index.js:1 at o index.js:1 at object.defineproperty.value index.js:6 at __webpack_require__ bootstrap 29dc0c7…:19 at object.defineproperty.value index.js:15 at __webpack_require__ bootstrap 29dc0c7…:19 at object.defineproperty.value index.js:6 at __webpack_require__ bootstrap 29dc0c7…:19 at object.<anonymous> client.js:19 at __webpack_require__ bootstrap 29dc0c7…:19 manually wrapping my component without using a function seems to work. i use @withapollo and other decorators fine in the same codebase. i wonder if you should use mridgway/hoist-non-react-statics https://github.com/mridgway/hoist-non-react-statics ? you can see it used here https://github.com/apollographql/react-apollo/blob/v0.12.0/src/graphql.tsx l151 by apollo.
